abstract: Coca-Cola executives will incorporate philanthropy and the social media into their Super Bowl ad plans.
snippet: Coca-Cola executives will incorporate philanthropy and the social media into their Super Bowl ad plans.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola is telling Pepsi-Cola that when it comes to Super Bowl advertising, you can walk and chew gum at the same time.

headline.main: Coca-Cola’s Super Bowl Ad Plans Include Social Media
